LanguageData.Rawwheat.label: wheat
LanguageData.Rawwheat.description: Wheat is a cereal grain, for milling into Flour.
LanguageData.Rawcocoa.label: cocoa
LanguageData.Rawcocoa.description: Cocoa beans are refined into choclate.
LanguageData.Rawsugarcane.label: sugarcane
LanguageData.Rawsugarcane.description: Harvested canes from the sugarcane plant.
LanguageData.cheese.label: cheese
LanguageData.Sugar.label: sugar
LanguageData.Sugar.description: Ground up from the cane plant. Used in baking.
LanguageData.Flour.label: flour
LanguageData.RawTobacco.label: tobacco
LanguageData.RawTobacco.description: Raw tobacco. Not recommended for eating, but makes for a nice smoke
LanguageData.Chocolate.label: chocolate
LanguageData.Chocolate.description: A delicious preparation of cocoa seeds ground together with sugar and vanilla. Very pleasurable to eat, but not very nutritious.
LanguageData.Cornmeal.label: Cornmeal
LanguageData.RawCoffee.label: coffee
LanguageData.RawCoffee.description: Raw Coffee. Best prepared as a beverage
LanguageData.Rawtea.label: tea leaves
LanguageData.Milk.label: milk
LanguageData.soymilk.label: soy milk
LanguageData.coconutmilk.label: coconut milk
LanguageData.coconutmilk.description: Milk harvested from the coconut fruit.
LanguageData.RawHops.label: hops
LanguageData.RawHops.description: Raw hops. A flavoring and preserving agent that is necessary for making beer.
LanguageData.NeutroPetals.label: Neutro Flower Petals
LanguageData.NeutroPetals.description: Beautiful Yellow-Orange Petals from the Neutro Flower. Used to make Neutroamine, a medicine base.
LanguageData.Hay.label: hay
LanguageData.Hay.description: Nutrient-rich grasses and shoots, harvested and compacted for storage. Hay is good animal feed, but inedible for humans.
LanguageData.Kibble.label: kibble
LanguageData.Kibble.description: Kibble animal feed made from mixed meat and plant sources.
LanguageData.Silage.label: silage
LanguageData.Silage.description: Nutrient-rich fermented hay and grains for your animals. The fermentation process preserves the silage preventing rot.
LanguageData.RawFertilizer.label: Fertilizer
LanguageData.RawFertilizer.description: Fertilizers enhance the soil and speed up the growth of plants.
LanguageData.VeganEgg.label: Vegan Egg Substitute
LanguageData.VeganEgg.description: Vegan Egg Substitute is a egg shape product made from tofu, pumpkin, or banana. Used in place of eggs in baking and other recipes.
LanguageData.VG_PileofDirt.label: Pile of Dirt
LanguageData.VG_PileofDirt.description: Simple soil dug out of the ground at a digging spot. Used to make fertilizer.
